content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Study WI \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHELP/Instructions?preview=%2F378543447%2F694250518%2FEPM-HELP_WI_Exit+Procedure+Workflow+and+Urgent+Account+Disabling+Procedure.doc\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Exit Procedure Workflow and Urgent Account Disabling Procedure\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn how Exit Request is created in support.epam.com and which teams are responsible for which actions.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
